deepLinking.ifHaveApp: If you already have the app:

dialog.WaitForHostMsg: The conference {{room}} has not yet started. If you are the host then please authenticate. Otherwise, please wait for the host to arrive.
dialog.WaitForHostMsgWOk: The conference {{room}} has not yet started. If you are the host then please press Ok to authenticate. Otherwise, please wait for the host to arrive.
dialog.alreadySharedVideoMsg: Another member is already sharing a video. This conference allows only one shared video at a time.
dialog.alreadySharedVideoTitle: Only one shared video is allowed at a time
dialog.cameraConstraintFailedError: Your camera does not satisfy some of the required constraints.
dialog.cameraNotSendingData: We are unable to access your camera. Please check if another application is using this device, select another device from the settings menu or try to reload the application.
dialog.cameraPermissionDeniedError: You have not granted permission to use your camera. You can still join the conference but others won't see you. Use the camera button in the address bar to fix this.
dialog.cameraUnknownError: Cannot use camera for an unknown reason.
dialog.cameraUnsupportedResolutionError: Your camera does not support required video resolution.
dialog.conferenceDisconnectMsg: You may want to check your network connection. Reconnecting in {{seconds}} sec…
dialog.conferenceReloadMsg: We're trying to fix this. Reconnecting in {{seconds}} sec…
dialog.connectError: Oops! Something went wrong and we couldn't connect to the conference.
dialog.connectErrorWithMsg: Oops! Something went wrong and we couldn't connect to the conference: {{msg}}
dialog.e2eeDescription: End-to-End Encryption is currently EXPERIMENTAL. Please keep in mind that turning on end-to-end encryption will effectively disable server-side provided services such as: recording, live streaming and phone participation. Also keep in mind that the meeting will only work for people joining from browsers with support for insertable streams.
dialog.e2eeWarning: WARNING: Not all participants in this meeting seem to have support for End-to-End encryption. If you enable it they won't be able to see nor hear you.
dialog.externalInstallationMsg: You need to install our desktop sharing extension.
dialog.gracefulShutdown: Our service is currently down for maintenance. Please try again later.
dialog.grantModeratorDialog: Are you sure you want to make this participant a moderator?
dialog.inlineInstallationMsg: You need to install our desktop sharing extension.
dialog.internalError: Oops! Something went wrong. The following error occurred: {{error}}
dialog.kickMessage: Ouch! You have been kicked out of the meet!
dialog.kickParticipantDialog: Er du sikker på at du vil kaste ut denne deltageren?
dialog.kickTitle: Oida. {{participantDisplayName}} kastet deg ut av møtet
dialog.liveStreamingDisabledBecauseOfActiveReco: Not possible while recording is active
dialog.logoutQuestion: Are you sure you want to logout and stop the conference?
dialog.maxUsersLimitReached: The limit for maximum number of members has been reached. The conference is full. Please contact the meeting owner or try again later!
dialog.micConstraintFailedError: Your microphone does not satisfy some of the required constraints.
dialog.micNotSendingData: We are unable to access your microphone. Please select another device from the settings menu or try to reload the application.
dialog.micPermissionDeniedError: You have not granted permission to use your microphone. You can still join the conference but others won't hear you. Use the camera button in the address bar to fix this.
dialog.micUnknownError: Cannot use microphone for an unknown reason.
dialog.muteEveryoneDialog: Are you sure you want to mute everyone? You won't be able to unmute them, but they can unmute themselves at any time.
dialog.muteEveryoneElseDialog: Once muted, you won't be able to unmute them, but they can unmute themselves at any time.
dialog.muteEveryoneStartMuted: Alle starter forstummet fra nå av
dialog.muteParticipantBody: Du vil ikke kunne oppheve forstumming av dem, men de kan oppheve forstumming selv når som helst.
dialog.muteParticipantDialog: Are you sure you want to mute this participant? You won't be able to unmute them, but they can unmute themselves at any time.
dialog.passwordNotSupported: Setting a meeting password is not supported.
dialog.popupError: Your browser is blocking pop-up windows from this site. Please enable pop-ups in your browser's security settings and try again.
dialog.recordingDisabledBecauseOfActiveLiveStre: Not possible while a live stream is active
dialog.remoteControlErrorMessage: An error occurred while trying to request remote control permissions from {{user}}!
dialog.remoteControlRequestMessage: Will you allow {{user}} to remotely control your desktop?
dialog.remoteControlShareScreenWarning: Note that if you press "Allow" you will share your screen!
dialog.removeSharedVideoMsg: Are you sure you would like to remove your shared video?
dialog.screenSharingFailed: Oops! Something went wrong, we weren’t able to start screen sharing!
dialog.screenSharingFailedToInstall: Oops! Your screen sharing extension failed to install.
dialog.screenSharingFailedToInstallTitle: Screen sharing extension failed to install
dialog.screenSharingFirefoxPermissionDeniedErro: Something went wrong while we were trying to share your screen. Please make sure that you have given us permission to do so.
dialog.screenSharingFirefoxPermissionDeniedTitl: Oops! We weren’t able to start screen sharing!
dialog.screenSharingPermissionDeniedError: Oops! Something went wrong with your screen sharing extension permissions. Please reload and try again.
dialog.sendPrivateMessage: You recently received a private message. Did you intend to reply to that privately, or you want to send your message to the group?
dialog.shareVideoLinkError: Please provide a correct youtube link.
dialog.startRemoteControlErrorMessage: An error occurred while trying to start the remote control session!
dialog.stopRecordingWarning: Are you sure you would like to stop the recording?
dialog.stopStreamingWarning: Are you sure you would like to stop the live streaming?
dialog.tokenAuthFailed: Sorry, you're not allowed to join this call.

1. Please join my online meeting.

{{roomUrl}}

Google Chrome is recommended for the best experience.

2. Use your microphone and speakers (VoIP) - a headset is recommended.

liveStreaming.errorAPI: An error occurred while accessing your YouTube broadcasts. Please try logging in again.
liveStreaming.errorLiveStreamNotEnabled: Live Streaming is not enabled on {{email}}. Please enable live streaming or log into an account with live streaming enabled.
liveStreaming.expandedOn: The meeting is currently being streamed to YouTube.
liveStreaming.expandedPending: The live streaming is being started…

liveStreaming.limitNotificationDescriptionWeb: Due to high demand your streaming will be limited to {{limit}} min. For unlimited streaming try {{app}}.

lobby.backToKnockModeButton: No password, ask to join instead
lobby.disableDialogContent: Lobby mode is currently enabled. This feature ensures that unwanted participants can't join your meeting. Do you want to disable it?
lobby.enableDialogText: Lobby mode lets you protect your meeting by only allowing people to enter after a formal approval by a moderator.
lobby.joinRejectedMessage: Your join request was rejected by a moderator.
lobby.joinWithPasswordMessage: Trying to join with password, please wait...
lobby.joiningMessage: You'll join the meeting as soon as someone accepts your request
lobby.knockTitle: Someone wants to join the meeting
lobby.notificationLobbyAccessDenied: {{targetParticipantName}} has been rejected to join by {{originParticipantName}}
lobby.notificationLobbyAccessGranted: {{targetParticipantName}} has been allowed to join by {{originParticipantName}}

messages.finished: Recording session {{token}} finished. Please send the recorded file to the moderator.
messages.finishedModerator: Recording session {{token}} finished. The recording of the local track has been saved. Please ask the other participants to submit their recordings.
messages.notModerator: You are not the moderator. You cannot start or stop local recording.

lonelyMeetingExperience.youAreAlone: You are the only one in the meeting

notify.muted: You have started the conversation muted.
notify.mutedRemotelyDescription: You can always unmute when you're ready to speak. Mute back when you're done to keep noise away from the meeting.
notify.oldElectronClientDescription1: You appear to be using an old version of the Jitsi Meet client which has known security vulnerabilities. Please make sure you update to our
notify.startSilentDescription: Rejoin the meeting to enable audio
notify.startSilentTitle: You joined with no audio output!
notify.suboptimalBrowserWarning: We are afraid your meeting experience isn't going to be that great here. We are looking for ways to improve this, but until then please try using one of the fully supported browsers.
notify.suboptimalExperienceDescription: Eer... we are afraid your experience with {{appName}} isn't going to be that great here. We are looking for ways to improve this but, until then, please try using one of the fully supported browsers.

prejoin.audioDeviceProblem: There is a problem with your audio device

connectionDetails.audioClipping: We expect your audio to be clipped.
connectionDetails.audioHighQuality: We expect your audio to have excellent quality.
connectionDetails.audioLowNoVideo: We expect your audio quality to be low and no video.
connectionDetails.goodQuality: Awesome! Your media quality is going to be great.
connectionDetails.noMediaConnectivity: We could not find a way to establish media connectivity for this test. This is typically caused by a firewall or NAT.
connectionDetails.noVideo: We expect that your video will be terrible.
connectionDetails.undetectable: If you still can not make calls in browser, we recommend that you make sure your speakers, microphone and camera are properly set up, that you have granted your browser rights to use your microphone and camera, and that your browser version is up-to-date. If you still have trouble calling, you should contact the web application developer.
connectionDetails.veryPoorConnection: We expect your call quality to be really terrible.
connectionDetails.videoFreezing: We expect your video to freeze, turn black, and be pixelated.
connectionDetails.videoHighQuality: We expect your video to have good quality.
connectionDetails.videoLowQuality: We expect your video to have low quality in terms of frame rate and resolution.
connectionDetails.videoTearing: We expect your video to be pixelated or have visual artefacts.

connection.nonOptimal: Your internet connection is not optimal
connection.poor: You have a poor internet connection

security.about: You can add a $t(lockRoomPassword) to your meeting. Participants will need to provide the $t(lockRoomPassword) before they are allowed to join the meeting.

security.insecureRoomNameWarning: The room name is unsafe. Unwanted participants may join your conference. Consider securing your meeting using the security button.

settingsView.alertURLText: The entered server URL is invalid

welcomepage.appDescription: Go ahead, video chat with the whole team. In fact, invite everyone you know. {{app}} is a fully encrypted, 100% open source video conferencing solution that you can use all day, every day, for free — with no account needed.
welcomepage.jitsiOnMobile: Jitsi on mobile – download our apps and start a meeting from anywhere
welcomepage.moderatedMessage: Or book a meeting URL in advance where you are the only moderator.
welcomepage.recentListEmpty: Your recent list is currently empty. Chat with your team and you will find all your recent meetings here.
welcomepage.roomNameAllowedChars: Meeting name should not contain any of these characters: ?, &, :, ', ", %, #.
welcomepage.roomnameHint: Enter the name or URL of the room you want to join. You may make a name up, just let the people you are meeting know it so that they enter the same name.
welcomepage.title: Secure, fully featured, and completely free video conferencing
